test_message: Calculate costs for: 1 agent, 5000 monthly sessions, 3 API calls per session, KB size 50MB, 2 tool integrations, using GPT-5 Mini model with approximately 500 input tokens and 200 output tokens per query

actual_response.breakdown: Creation costs include 1 agent ($0.05), 5000 sessions ($250), 50MB KB ($50), 2 tools ($0.20). No RAI specified. Runtime per query includes KB Retrieval ($0.05), 3 API Light calls ($0.15 total), memory ($0.005). Model costs for GPT-5 Mini are $0.25 per 1M input tokens and $2 per 1M output tokens. Each query uses 500 input and 200 output tokens, costing $0.000125 and $0.0004 respectively. With 5000 sessions and 3 queries per session, there are 15,000 monthly queries. Monthly total cost combines creation costs and (runtime+model) costs across all queries. Annual total multiplies monthly by 12. Cost per session divides monthly total by session count; cost per query divides monthly total by query count.
